footer.licence_1: All content is available under the

home.title: Pay a DVSA Penalty
home.description_2: Your DVSA Penalty notice will tell you how much you have to pay and when you must pay it by.
home.info_text: If you don't pay your fine on time your vehicle may remain immobilised, or your details passed to a debt collection agency.
home.before_start_text: This service is also available in:

payment_code_page.title: Pay a DVSA Penalty
payment_code_page.hint:
This is a code issued together with the penalty notice.
For example, a1b2c3d4e5f6e7b8' or 'a1b2x8y9z0'
payment_code_page.hidden_panel_title: I don't have a payment code
payment_code_page.hidden_panel_text:
The DVSA examiner normally sends the payment code (or token) via SMS or email, at the time of processing the penalty. The code is usually sent to the driver of the vehicle or their company, as requested at the time of processing.

If you are the intended recipient, you can recheck your email inbox or text messages, or request the DVSA examiner send the payment code again. Alternatively, you can contact the customer support centre, to arrange payment by using the penalty reference number, if that is available to you

error.title: There was a problem
error.description: The payment code you entered was not recognised by the system.

penalty_details_page.intro: We found the following details in our records
penalty_details_page.confirmation: You paid a penalty for the payment code:
penalty_details_page.confirmation_sent: A confirmation has been sent to the DVSA location where the penalty has been issued.
penalty_details_page.hidden_panel_title: There is something wrong with these details
penalty_details_page.hidden_panel_text: Please contact the customer support centre to confirm the correct penalty details.
penalty_details_page.make_note: alternatively, make a note of the confirmation code for later reference.
penalty_details_page.return_to_page: You can also return to this page by typing the token code in the
penalty_details_page.warning_text: If you have fixed penalties and an immobilisation fee you need to pay them individually
penalty_details_page.includes_following_penalties: This payment code includes the following penalties:

multipayment_details.title: Pay fixed penalties and immobilisation fees

email.title: Send payment receipt by email
email.description: We'll only use this to send you a payment receipt

multipayment_receipt.further_payment_warning: Fixed penalties, court deposits and immobilisation fees have to be paid individually
multipayment_receipt.back_to_summary: Return to the payment code summary

failed_payment_page.title: Your payment has been declined
failed_payment_page.info:
No money has been taken from your account.
Contact your bank for more details.
